title: Friedensgipfel vor dem Museum
style: symbolic comic, clean lineart, soft cel shading, vivid colors

panels.setting: grand museum plaza with tall stone columns, red carpet, jets flying in the sky, symbolic atmosphere
beats: bear (Russia) and eagle (USA) arrive on the plaza

dialogue.speaker: Adler
dialogue.text: Vielleicht finden wir heute einen Weg.

panels.setting: same plaza, afternoon light, symbolic map on the ground between them
beats: bear places paw on part of the map
eagle holds a glowing shield (security promise)

dialogue.speaker: Adler
dialogue.text: Nur wenn wir die Sicherheit für alle wahren.

panels.setting: museum steps with microphones, symbolic press conference scene
beats: bear and eagle stand side by side
crowd of symbolic animals in the background

panels.setting: same plaza, fox and owl arrive, standing near the bear and eagle
beats: bear and eagle glance at them

dialogue.speaker: Fuchs
dialogue.text: Lasst uns gemeinsam an den Frieden glauben.

panels.setting: warm sunlight shining, all four animals form a circle
beats: white dove with olive branch flies above
